name: Sequential Dungeon
description:
Welcome to the world of Sequential Dungeon, where 64 different levels in 8 uniquely themed worlds await you in a simple yet challenging experience! Get ready to bring your puzzle solving skills up to the task as there will be a limited amount of moves available to clear each of the levels, and with a vast array of different mechanics for you to master, it surely will not be an easy task!

Features

  • Explore 8 uniquely themed floors
  • Solve 64 challenging puzzles, or skip them if they prove too challenging
  • Experience 14 easy to understand yet challenging mechanics
  • Easy to understand gameplay with challenging puzzles
